QuestParts.EndText: Thank you for helping us dude, here's all that we own.
QuestParts.Response2: What happened are you from the Farm?
QuestParts.GiverText: My good dude we need your help!
QuestParts.ObjectiveText: Kill all Demons on the Farm. SAVE THE CROPS!

QuestParts.EndText: Keep the shotgun, you need more than I do.

QuestParts.Response1: I'm on it, head east, there are others there.
QuestParts.GiverText: Yes I am. The Demons came from the South they sacked our farm and killed our dogs, my husband is trapped our Hut! Please help us!

QuestParts.Response2: Your stammering has warmed heart, I'll do it.
QuestParts.Response1: This sounds too hard, you're on your own Peasant.

QuestParts.EndText: Thank you for saving our farm, keep the shotgun, you need it more than I do.
QuestParts.Response1: Thank you! Be on your way!
QuestParts.GiverText: Thank you man, here take this, you'll need.
